Class Average

java.lang.Object
dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.quality.profilingstatistics.ProfileStatistic
dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.quality.profilingstatistics.DependentProfileStatistic
dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.quality.profilingstatistics.singlecolumn.datatypeinfo.Average
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<ProfileStatistic>
public class Average
extends DependentProfileStatistic
Describes the metric Average, where the average of all values in an Attribute is taken.
